badge_template_activities.title: The earner has provided youth mentoring to participants on a programme centered around wellbeing, confidence, relationships and employability skills.

The earner has worked in a mixture of full room activities, large group and smaller group breakouts and 1:1 sessions to share their experiences, stories of their education and career journeys
The earner has volunteered their time at 6 sessions to support young people to understand what positive changes they need to make to realise their aspirations.

Open to adults who are willing to share their experiences and stories of their education and career journey’s
